snippet: The perfect political alchemy of low voter turnout, the languid campaign of his opponent and his own strong grass-roots base gave Mr. Hogan a decisive four-point victory.
abstract: Election of largely unknown real estate executive Larry Hogan as Maryland's Republican Governor-elect is perhaps biggest GOP surprise victory of midterm elections; in largely Democratic state, his decisive victory was achieved through national mood, low voter turnout, languid campaign of opponent Anthony G Brown and a strong grass-roots base.
lead_paragraph: The perfect political alchemy of low voter turnout, the languid campaign of his opponent and his own strong grass-roots base gave Mr. Hogan a decisive four-point victory.

headline.main: Gov.-Elect Larry Hogan, a Republican, Stands Tall in Democratic Maryland
headline.print_headline: Republican Stands Tall in Democratic Maryland
